title: Looping Through Numbers
description: Write a program that uses a loop to print out the numbers from 1 to 10, along with their squares. The output should be in the format 'Number: X, Square: Y', where X is the number and Y is the square of the number.
sample_output:
Number: 1, Square: 1
Number: 2, Square: 4
Number: 3, Square: 9
Number: 4, Square: 16
Number: 5, Square: 25
Number: 6, Square: 36
Number: 7, Square: 49
Number: 8, Square: 64
Number: 9, Square: 81
Number: 10, Square: 100
